18238698.admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

repnme.cdata!:
People's Democratic Republic of Yemen
            - Third Highway Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Highway Project seeks to
            promote the social, economic and administrative integration
            of the country by improving access to the towns of Ataq, As
            Said and Nisab, in the presently isolated Shabwah
            Governorate, through construction of a two-lane paved road.
            This road is also expected to stimulate agricultural
            production in the vicinity of these towns. It will also
            strengthen PDRY's road construction capabilities: (i)
            through about 130 manmonths of consultants assistance to the
            Ministry of Construction (MOC) for improvement of project
            preparation capabilities, management, and operations of the
            MOC's construction units, including the independent
            construction unit (ICU) established under the project; and
            (ii) through training of MOC and ICU staff including about
            90 manmonths of long and short-term overseas fellowships.

docna.cdata!:
People's Democratic Republic of Yemen -
            Third Highway Project
